summary: LayerScale implements a learnable per-dimension scaling factor that multiplies the output tensor of a layer. It initializes the scale with a user‑specified value (clamped between 0 and 1) and maintains a parameter sized to the projection dimension, applying it during the forward pass.
business_intent: Stabilize and improve training of deep neural networks—especially transformer‑based architectures—by introducing a controllable, learnable scaling operation that can regularize feature magnitudes and accelerate convergence.
